arm_group.arm_group_label: Subtotal gastrectomy added to whipple procedure.
arm_group.description: Subtotal gastrectomy added to Whipple procedure.

brief_summary.textblock:
A small gastric remnant after whipple resection improves gastric emptying and therefore
      prevents the development of delayed gastric emptying.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Size of the Gastric Remnant as Determinant for Delayed Gastric Emptying After Whipple Resection.

detailed_description.textblock:
Every patient submitted to a whipple resection and at the same time present with
      characteristics suggestive of minimal risk for leakage from the pancreaticojejunostomy will
      be included in the study. At the time of reconstruction the patient will be randomized to
      either conventional size of the stomach or to a subtotal gastrectomy containing a small
      upper gastric pouch only.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

        All patients undergoing whipple procedure with preoperative assignment as low risk for
        leakage from the pancreaticojejunal anastomosis.

          -  Signed informed consent.

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  High and intermediate risk pancreaticojejunal anastomosis. Unwillingness to
             participate.

intervention.arm_group_label: Subtotal gastrectomy added to whipple procedure.
intervention.description: Subtotal gastrectomy as an adjunct to traditional whipple procedure.
intervention.intervention_name: Subtotal gastrectomy as an adjunct to traditional whipple procedure.

intervention.description: All patients undergoing whipple procedure without risk for pancreaticojejunal anastomosis leakage.

clinical_study.official_title: Phase Two Randomized Study of The Size of the Gastric Remnant as Determinant for Delayed Gastric Emptying After Whipple Resection.

primary_outcome.description: During the postoperative phase the patient will be followed daily with assessment of symptoms suggestive of delayed gastric emptying.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Postoperative recovery period in days (on an average <20 days)

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: Quality of life measured by use of scientifically validated instruments.
Time in days from the operation to discharge from hospital.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: In hospital stay in days (on an average <20 days)

secondary_outcome.description: Paracetamol orally ingested together with chocolate biscuits whereafter peripheral venous blood concentrations of paracetamol are determined. Blood samples taken at baseline  and every 15 minutes after paracetamol ingestion during the first hour and then every 30 minutes for an hour.
secondary_outcome.measure: Total Gastric emptying as measured by the paracetamol test

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Single Blind (Subject), Primary Purpose: Treatment
